text: The 1999–2000 FA Premier League (known as the FA Carling Premiership for sponsorship reasons) was the eighth season of the FA Premier League. Manchester United secured their sixth Premiership title. Like the previous season, they lost only three league games all season. Unlike in the 1998–99 season, they won comfortably, by 18 points rather than a single point. Category:Premier League seasons
title: 1999–2000 FA Premier League
